channel.title: [Added] Mark Netherland Antilles (AN) as withdrawn in Country codelist
channel.description:
I created [a pull request for this](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/161) back in June, but a discuss post wasn’t created, which is possibly why it wasn’t actioned.
Netherland Antilles (AN) is no longer part of the ISO 3166 list of country codes, so it should be marked as `status="withdrawn"` in the IATI non-embedded [Country codelist](http://iatistandard.org/202/codelists/Country/).

item.title: [Added] Mark Netherland Antilles (AN) as withdrawn in Country codelist
item.dc:creator: hayfield
item.source: [Added] Mark Netherland Antilles (AN) as withdrawn in Country codelist

item.title: [Added] Mark Netherland Antilles (AN) as withdrawn in Country codelist
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
@andylolz Thanks for adding this to Discuss and apologies for the delay in reviewing the request.
The IATI tech team have now reviewed and accepted this request. We expect changes to be implemented this week.

Read full topic
